title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Saturday, September 16 (game #600)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Honda's suitcase-style microscooter is a brilliantly impractical way to commute
description: The Motocompacto can hit speeds of up to 15 mph and its easy to carry thanks to its tightly packed-in design.

title: Acer's 540Hz gaming monitor is coming and it could undercut the competition
description: Acer revealed its own 500Hz+ gaming monitor, which could challenge both Asus and Dell if the price turns out to be right.

title: Meta denies claims that it plans on ruining WhatsApp with ads
description: Meta released a statement denying the claim that it was planning to add in-feed adverts to messaging platform WhatsApp.

title: Blackmagic finally goes full-frame with 6K video camera that has Sony-rivaling features
description: The new Blackmagic Cinema Camera 6K is the company’s first full-frame video camera with L-Mount lenses.

title: Windows 11 screenshots are going to be even better as Microsoft turbo-charges Snipping Tool and Photos app
description: Windows 11 introduces exciting updates, including text capture in Snipping Tool and background blur in Photos App.

title: A faster, more productive Windows 11 is coming and Microsoft has given Insider members a preview
description: Microsoft's Windows Insider Program gives exclusive access to Windows 11 Build 23545, featuring improvements to File Explorer, AI voice assistant, and more.

title: Helldivers 2 has been delayed to February 2024
description: Helldivers 2 has been delayed and will now launch on February 8, 2024 for PS5 and PC via Steam.

title: PlayStation bought elite hi-fi maestro Audeze, but its CEO says audiophiles don’t need to worry
description: Sony Interactive Entertainment snapped up some serious audio talent, but it'll still release music-friendly headphones.

title: Tales of Arise is getting an expansion two years after its launch
description: Tales of Arise is getting a new expansion called Beyond the Dawn, two years after the game launched.

title: The Online Safety Bill is just the tip of the UK Surveillance State iceberg
description: Two legal proposals are set to give the UK government greater powers to access citizens' communications and crack encryption. Here is what's at stake.

title: Cisco pulls its HyperFlex hyperconverged infrastructure products
description: Evolving customer needs and market dynamics are blamed for Cisco’s discontinuation of HyperFlex.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, Disney Plus and more this weekend (September 15)
description: From returning TV dramas to new Prime Video thrillers, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Honkai: Star Rail launches on PS5 next month
description: Hoyoverse has announced that Honkai: Star Rail will launch on PlayStation 5 on October 11, 2023.

title: TCL confirms US pricing of its Fire TV range, and it’s ridiculously cheap
description: The new range of TCL TVs with Fire TV software have arrived, and as you’d expect from TCL, they look like a bargain

title: WordPress is getting a major fediverse upgrade
description: Self-hosted WordPress blogs can link to the fediverse more smoothly with this improved plug-in.

title: Whoops! Google doesn’t know how to repair your broken Pixel Watch screen
description: Google has revealed that it doesn't know how to fix your Google Pixel Watch, so if it breaks you'll need a new one.

title: Google Ads are being hijacked to serve up dangerous malware
description: A malvertising campaign has been found on Google masquerading as a convincing download page for Cisco Webex.

title: Ascendant Studios lays off half its staff less than a month after Immortals of Aveum launched
description: Ascendant Studios has laid off nearly half of its staff less than a month after the launch of Immortals of Aveum due to poor sales.

title: If you’re planing to get the iPhone 15, then Focal’s Bathys are the ideal headphones
description: If you use Focal's Bathys wireless headphones in wired mode, they'll give your iPhone 15 an instant pro audio upgrade.

title: Spotify adds new music recommendations feature but it’s not great for bands on a budget
description: Showcase enables artists to book sponsored recommendations that'll appear as banners on Spotify's busiest page.

title: Bitwarden adds passwordless SSO
description: Bitwarden has now expanded its SSO capabilities, allowing users to access their vaults without a password.

title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth launches in February 2024 for PS5
description: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth is set to launch on February 29, 2024 for PlayStation 5.

title: Microsoft and Oracle reveal major cloud tie-up
description: Microsoft is offering to host Oracle services in its Azure datacenters as both companies look to attract multicloud customers.

title: The 'carbon neutral' Apple Watch is a fresh blast of Apple's reality distortion field
description: Apple says it's made its first 'carbon neutral' product. But what exactly does that mean? Here's a breakdown of that new badge.

title: iPhone 15 preorders go live today – but which phone should you get?
description: Secure an iPhone 15 ready for the September 22 release by getting a preorder in when they go live today.

title: The Samsung Galaxy S24 series might have lots of RAM but slow charging
description: The Samsung Galaxy S24 line has been certified, revealing disappointing charging speeds.

title: Unity temporarily shuts offices after receiving threats
description: Unity has had to temporarily shutter some offices following "a potential threat" to employees' safety.

title: Netflix announces One Piece season 2, and that's bad news for Shadow and Bone season 3
description: One Piece will continue to sail on the streaming high seas after Netflix renewed it for another season.

title: Microsoft's legal battle over Teams dominance could be about to get even worse
description: Microsoft will unbundle Teams from its 365 suite next month, but it looks like this wasn’t enough for the European Commission.

title: Viral rhythm game Trombone Champ has launched on Nintendo Switch
description: Trombone Champ has arrived on Nintendo Switch and implements a hands-on approach to controls.

title: Hades 2 is set to launch in early access in Q2 2024
description: Supergiant Games has announced that Hades 2 will launch in early access in Q2 2024 for PC.

title: Sony upstages the iPhone 15 Pro with an impressively pro video app
description: Sony’s FX6, FX3 and FX30 cine cameras can now be monitored wirelessly through the new Monitor & Control app.

title: Spider-Man 2 on PS5 looks to include every suit you could ever want
description: Sony has revealed new info about Spider-Man 2 during a recent State of Play event, with a wealth of suits to use around New York.

title: Resident Evil 4 remake's Separate Ways DLC finally launches next week
description: Resident Evil 4's long-awaited Separate Ways DLC campaign is finally coming to the acclaimed remake next week.

title: Foundation season 2 ending explained: is [SPOILER] dead and more big questions answered
description: TechRadar breaks down the Foundation season 2 finale, including who lives and dies, and what it sets up about a potential third season.

title: Tiny PC vendor teases first Windows tablet that doubles as a portable monitor – but it will be expensive
description: Minisforum’s 14in tablet will be powered by an AMD processor.
